term.title: electron correlation

item.text: The adjustment of electron motion to the instantaneous (as opposed to time-averaged) positions of all the electrons in a molecular entity.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2238 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
